about_the_game:
Millennia ago, ancient mana fortresses once kept your world safe. Forgotten and abandoned, now they are the only hope in a desperate struggle for survival. Your task is to revive and defend these fortresses.

  • Each battle is unique, with different defensive options and spells to acquire and use in defense of your fortress
  • Hold out against increasingly difficult and varied waves of enemies
  • Find rare and powerful artifacts
  • Balance gathering resources with building up your defenses
  • Use gathered resources brought back from the fortresses to upgrade your central outpost, giving you persistent upgrades and expanded options with future fortresses

name: Mana Fortress
short_description: Mana Fortress is a roguelite base defense strategy game. Build up your arsenal of towers and spells to keep your fortress safe from waves of enemies while you gather enough mana and resources to ensure victory.
